div.p: Observed concentrations and δ 34S values of non-sea-salt (nss-) SO 4 2−. ( a) Map of the aerosol sampling sites, with seasonal variations in ( b) concentrations (solid line: total suspended particle, dashed line: fine mode particle) and ( c) δ 34S values of nss-SO 4 2− at Dome C (red) and Dumont d’Urville (blue) with residual values between the two sites. Error bars represent the standard errors propagated from the analytical error of concentrations, δ 34S values, and the uncertainty in SO 4 2−/Na + ratios in sea salt (see Methods).
